A new year is upon us, and if your wardrobe is in need of an overhaul to ring in 2022 in style, you're in luck. Zappos is holding a massive Winter Clearance sale on shoes, coats and more, including markdowns on popular brands like Clarks, Ugg, Crocs and more.

Start off the New Year with deals and shopping advice delivered straight to your phone. Sign up for text message alerts from the experts at Reviewed.

The Zappos Winter Clearance sale is home to steep discounts on Crocs, which were one of the most popular gifts this year, with Classic Clogs starting at $34.95 (saving you $15) and lined Crocs starting at $39.95 (saving you $20). You can also find this pair of chunky platform Chelsea boots from Sam Edelman for $106.59, a 59% markdown from the original price of $180.

►New Year's Eve:  Are stores closed New Year's Eve? No, but hours are limited.

► New year, new tech:  Snag stellar Samsung tech with huge savings before the new year

If you're in the market for new clothes for 2022, Zappos also has massive discounts on stylish pieces like this classic, durable zip-up sweater from Pendleton for $135.81 (it's typically $239) and this cozy pair of Under Armour sweatpants for $33.75 (saving you $12.25).
